Package jpacman.model

Class MovingGuest

java.lang.Object
jpacman.model.Guest
jpacman.model.MovingGuest
Direct Known Subclasses:
Monster, Player
public abstract class MovingGuest extends Guest
Type for guests with moving capabilities. The actual moving is handled by the Move class and its subclasses.
Version:
$Id: MovingGuest.java,v 1.2 2008/02/03 19:01:50 arie Exp $
Author:
Arie van Deursen; Aug 3, 2003
